titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of the Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management RG.33.6
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-04-09 11:35:12 -0400.

did.unittitle: Records of the Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Rudin Center for Transportation Policy & Management

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: Rudin Center for Transportation Policy & Management

did.abstract: The Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management is a research institute based at the Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service at New York University. The Center conducts and disseminates research on infrastructure and transportation policy, as well as the connections between these areas and social and economic issues. The Records of the Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management consists of reports produced by faculty and research staff of the Rudin Center.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Records of the Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management consists of reports produced by faculty and research staff of the Rudin Center.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by New York University are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact New York University Archives, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Tess von Kleist, Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management, NYU Wagner, in March 2024; the accession number associated with this transfer is 2024.024.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Records of the Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management; RG 33.6; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: During accessioning, materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders, and described on the collection-level with a folder-level inventory.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Rudin Center for Transportation Policy and Management is a research institute based at the Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service at New York University. The Center conducts and disseminates research on infrastructure and transportation policy, as well as the connections between these areas and social and economic issues.
